alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Houston; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 11:17PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bibb, northwestern Twiggs and northeastern Houston Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1117 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Lizella to Skipperton to Robins AFB, and moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Warner Robins, Payne, Robins AFB, Payne City, Marion, Lake Tobesofkee, Robins Air Force Base, Bullard, Rutland, Fitzpatrick, Ripley, Huber, Cross Keys, Wesleyan, Dry Branch, Lizella, Skipperton, Elberta and Franklinton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
